channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Awin Data Feed
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Awin Data Feed

item.title: CVE-2022-1938|2024-08-03T00:24:42.640Z -- unknown -- awin%20data%20feed
item.description: The Awin Data Feed WordPress plugin before 1.8 does not sanitise and escape a header when processing request to generate analytics data, allowing unauthenticated users to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks against a logged in admin viewing the plugin's settings

item.title: CVE-2022-1937|2024-08-03T00:24:42.589Z -- unknown -- awin%20data%20feed
item.description: The Awin Data Feed WordPress plugin before 1.8 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back via an AJAX action (available to both unauthenticated and authenticated users), leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
